replies.body: ah fuck , how long does this maintenance last ?
Same problamo, I just got a kill on a yasuo *My Life Was Complete* Then that happened :(
I just got booted out of an aram. Half way through. Hope this doesn't go on the record lol.
i was 8/1/3 as gp in a normal when i got kicked out, we were losing i had faith in my carry potential
Apparently server maintenance. Nice to let us know.
